summary: AN ORDINANCE ratifying and confirming the approval by the Mayor and City Comptroller of a revised page 6 in that certain agreement with the United States of America, Department of the Interior acting by and through the Bonneville Power Administrator and with the Washington Public Power Supply System authorized by Ordinance 101845 to permit the sale of a portion of the project output of Nuclear Project No. 3 for a period terminating on July 1, 1984 to other entities in addition to electric utilities.
